info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Berkshire, northeastern Columbia, southeastern Albany and southern Rensselaer Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Stephentown to near Ravena. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, East Greenbush, Nassau, New Baltimore, Ravena, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Valatie, Castleton-On-Hudson, Selkirk, Averill Park, Coeymans, East Nassau, Coeymans Hollow, Brookview, Van Hoesen Station, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Spawn Hollow and Beckers Corners. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
